name: places/ChIJAfRmj1hYwokR0eMOS08g3ts
formattedAddress: 18 E 41st Street First Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 18 E 41st Street First Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
Updated 8/30/2023:

I was lucky enough to be taken care of by another urology provider to treat my issue in another facility.

If you read this comment, please avoid this doctor. Search your insurance provider list and read comments, you will find a better one for sure.
--------------
I was referred from my doctor to Dr. Kaufman.

Sadly it was a bad experience. It seems the doctor didn't have any patience to listen to the patients, and the instructions given is confusing to me and the front desk.

I was trying to ask for clarification after discussions with the front desk because she also didn't understand how to schedule the required series of appointments and I don't understand why we still need to do ultrasound even though we already did that 1 month ago from my PCP's order.

I went back to the doctor's office, notified the nurse we may need some clarifications and patiently wait.

After I got the chance to ask, the doctor just pointed the finger to the sky and told me "only 2 mins for follow-up questions" without any expression. I pointed that the instructions are not clear to the front desk and he also missed my ultrasound report from my PCP - so extra ultrasound actually is not needed.

He rushed to change the plan. No sorry, no patience.

I already wrote the story and shared the experience with my PCP. I ask Crossover to STOP sending referrals to this doctor. I have changed the urology provider.

This is the first time ever in my life I feel disappointed by a doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Kaufman is the absolute best! I went to see him for an unusual problem, and I always felt confident that he was giving me the best care that I could get anywhere. He understood that my quality of life was suffering because of my problem, and he was determined to come up with a plan that would help fix the issue. He was able to quickly identify what the cause was and he ultimately performed the surgery that has since corrected the problem for me completely. Dr. Kaufman has such a nice way about him and is always so pleasant, and the officer manager, Nancy, is also such a pleasure to deal with. I would highly recommend Dr. Kaufman to anyone to wants the best of the best. He is simply an amazing doctor!

I would highly recommend Dr. Kaufman to anyone to wants the best of the best. He is simply an amazing doctor!

originalText.text: Dr. Kaufman has been my doctor for many years.  He's been excellent in every respect, is both friendly and professional.  It's clear that he keeps up with the latest developments in his field.  I feel fortunate and privileged to have him keeping an eye on things.

text.text: Dr. Kaufman has been my doctor for many years.  He's been excellent in every respect, is both friendly and professional.  It's clear that he keeps up with the latest developments in his field.  I feel fortunate and privileged to have him keeping an eye on things.

originalText.text: I have always enjoyed working with Dr Kaufman over the years. He is very knowledgeable and also has a good sense of humor while looking out for my best interests as a patient. I would highly recommend him to anyone needing a very capable, well informed and congenial doctor as a partner in your care.

I would highly recommend him to anyone needing a very capable, well informed and congenial doctor as a partner in your care.

originalText.text: Extremely happy with my visit to Dr. Kaufman.  His staff is incredibly efficient and friendly.  Dr. Kaufman visited me almost immediately.  His bedside manner was extraordinary, and he made me feel extremely comfortable.  Dr. Kaufman really knows his stuff, and I feel more comfortable with him than with prior doctors.
